July 3, 1926 D Sedgefield Contest
Sedgefield Contest 0 Own Choice from a Specified List
sedgefield-contest
None
Sedgefield, County Durham March contest - 1st Horden, 2nd Craghead, 3rd Eldon. Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £4, 4th £3. Choice of The Talisman, Oberon or Melodious Gems. 7 bands competed.
Nov. 12, 2018, 9:12 a.m. Nov. 12, 2018, 9:17 a.m.
1 BHK (UK) Horden Band Joseph Foster
2 Reg Vardy Band Gus Haigh
3 Darlington Forge G. C. Cooper
4 Easington Colliery Band J. Blaylock
